SEARCH
Package de.jakob.tasks.gartenarbeit

Klasse Pflanze

java.lang.Object
de.jakob.tasks.gartenarbeit.Pflanze
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
BlauerEisenhut, Rosengewaechs, Salbei
public sealed class Pflanze extends Object permits BlauerEisenhut, Salbei, Rosengewaechs
The Pflanze class represents a plant with properties such as maximum length, growth rate, and current length. This is a sealed class permitting specific subclasses. It provides methods for watering and trimming the plant.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Pflanze(int maxLaenge, int wachstum, int laenge)
    Constructs a new Pflanze instance with the specified maximum length, growth rate, and initial length.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Pflanze

      public Pflanze(int maxLaenge, int wachstum, int laenge)
      Constructs a new Pflanze instance with the specified maximum length, growth rate, and initial length. If the initial length exceeds the maximum length, it is set to 0.
      Parameter:
      maxLaenge - the maximum length the plant can grow to
      wachstum - the growth rate of the plant
      laenge - the initial length of the plant

  • Methodendetails

    • getMaxLaenge

      public int getMaxLaenge()
      Returns the maximum length the plant can grow to.
      Gibt zurück:
      the maximum length of the plant

    • getWachstum

      public int getWachstum()
      Returns the growth rate of the plant.
      Gibt zurück:
      the growth rate of the plant

    • getLaenge

      public int getLaenge()
      Returns the current length of the plant.
      Gibt zurück:
      the current length of the plant

    • setLaenge

      public void setLaenge(int laenge)
      Sets the current length of the plant.
      Parameter:
      laenge - the new length of the plant

    • waessern

      public void waessern()
      Waters the plant, causing it to grow by the specified growth rate, up to the maximum length. If the plant is already at or beyond its maximum length, it does not grow further.

    • schneiden

      public void schneiden(int x)
      Trims the plant by reducing its length by a specified amount. The plant's length will not fall below 1.
      Parameter:
      x - the amount to reduce the plant's length by
